remarks: Reprove ~ vtoclg1f from ~ bj-vtoclg1f1 .  This removes dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-cleq and ~ df-v .  Use ~ bj-vtoclg1fv instead when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-vtoclg1f.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-vtoclg1f.maj $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-vtoclg1f.min $e |- ph $.
bj-vtoclg1f $p |- ( A e. V -> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
